name: White Knight
description: White Knight is a “Chong Certified” hybrid strain from Encanto Green Cross in Phoenix, Arizona. With fragrant notes of earthy pine, White Knight strikes a balance between buzzing euphoria and physical relaxation.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Energetic, Uplifted, Stress, Nausea, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
